LoadMapRequestPacket Class Reference

Packet that is send from the Leader to the Available to make them load a new map from the MapModule (or, if it's a MapModule that should load a new map, from disc). More...

#include <LoadMapPacket.h>

  • const int DEST_PORT_POS = DEST_IP_POS + 4
    Position of destPort ( 4 bytes ).

Detailed Description

Packet that is send from the Leader to the Available to make them load a new map from the MapModule (or, if it's a MapModule that should load a new map, from disc).

<br />

) 
 

Constructor.

Parameters:
mapID ID of the map the receiver should load.
originIP IP of the sender.
originPort Port of the sender.
destIP The ip that the request was sent to. (JT does not know this).
destPort The port of the receiver.
